subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy’s triumph was the fifth straight in a major by a golfer who isn’t American — a boon for global expansion of the game but a sign of uncertainty in the United States.
snippet: Rory McIlroy’s triumph was the fifth straight in a major by a golfer who isn’t American — a boon for global expansion of the game but a sign of uncertainty in the United States.
